headline: ServiceNow (NOW) Launches Zurich Platform Featuring AI, Security, and Autonomous Workflows
summary: ServiceNow, Inc. (NYSE:NOW) ranks among the best fundamental stocks to buy right now. ServiceNow, Inc. (NYSE:NOW) unveiled its new Zurich platform on September 10, with capabilities centered on enterprise security, autonomous workflows, and multi-agent AI development. New developer tools included in the platform version allow for natural language “vibe coding,” which lets employees design apps […]
